CT Vision 1
  • CT Vision
    • 1
  • CT Vision
  • 2-creating-vision-settings-records-2-9.adoc

After installing the CT Vision package, create required Vision Settings records:

Go to the Vision Settings tab → click New.
If the tab is missing, create a custom tab for the Vision Settings object.

In the New Vision Setting window, select the record type and click Next.

The Vision Object record is required for CT Vision IR operation. The following records extend the CT Vision IR functionality:

  • Vision Shelf

  • Vision Hint

Specify parameters and click Save.

Repeat steps 2–3 to create all required and, if needed, additional Vision Settings records.

On the Vision Photo object, create Vision Object ID field for each Vision Object record and then specify its API name on the Vision Photo Lookup field on the Vision Object.

The setup is complete.

This page was built using the Antora default UI.
